website_summaries.verdict: The Apple iPad mini 4 is a top-notch small-screen tablet with unparalleled build quality and app support, but it's still hard to justify the jump in price over the iPad mini 2.
cons: Occasional minor performance issues in testing

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad
customer_reviews.text: An upgrade from my IPad Mini 1 which became very slow and frustrating to use. The difference is amazing. Faster, lighter and thinner. It is slightly taller then the first iPad mini but for me its no problem, just have to buy another case to fit. The only problem is that the battery life doesn't last as long as my old long. Oh and the charger is exactly as described. As I was a bit concerned after reading some of the reviews.

customer_reviews.title: User friendly iPad mini
customer_reviews.text: I'm delighted with my new iPad mini, just got to set everything up now. If you're a complete beginner the only instructions in the box are in Japanese! Beautiful graphics, resolution is perfect for a small screen very light and it sits in your hand very easily. Fast loading, good set-up procedure and option of a password if you don't like the fingerprint login. I'm upgrading from a generation 2 iPad so this is a huge improvement for me. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: PatsyG
